relation: you get what you pay for.
There isn't much unless you go to Delaware.
I resided in Hansberry which was a typical dorm room and in ASL which was clean but often noisy.
Very easy classes. Not a lot of major options As an AP student from California, academics was extremely easy.
If you're of a minority here at Lincoln, it is fun, but everyone will know what you do and what happens in your life.

The school is small and does what it can with a limited budget. As a student athlete, I felt under-appreciated and underfunded. Across the board, the people want the school to do well, but have poor leadership that ends up failing them.

TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {33911=Lincoln University's food and dining is provided by Thompson Hospitality Catering which is the nation’s largest minority-owned food service company. By the end of the semester, you can recognize everyone's face on campus., 5530=As an out of state student for New Jersey, Lincoln University is cheaper than some schools that are in state. Recently, the communication program received new radio and television programming equipment. Also, Lincoln gives merit award scholarships. If you have a good GPA and SAT score coming out of high school, Lincoln could award you money towards tuition, room and board, and/or fees., 32669=Lincoln University is the 1st Historically Black College University (HBCU) in the United states founded in 1854. The history and achievement Lincoln possesses can inspire any student once they walk on the yard. From the greats like Thurgood Marshall, Frederick Douglas, Langston Hughes and more, Lincoln builds legacy's every year once a student graduates and starts their career., 12453=Lincoln University is the first HBCU. textAfterTable: Great for these types of students This school is great for students who want to go to a small school. In size, Lincoln University has a small campus and within your first week you will be able to locate every building. In population, Lincoln has close to about 2000 students. Students are not just a number. Teachers actually know students by name. By the end of the semester, you can recognize everyone's face on campus. Tips for prospective students Don't be so narrowed minded. Looks are not everything. Campuses that look the best cost the most. Lincoln University may not look the best but it has some of the hardest working students who trying their best to continue that great Lincoln legacy. Also the best way to enjoy your stay at Lincoln is to join an organization. It really gets you involved. Bang for the buck As an out of state student for New Jersey, Lincoln University is cheaper than some schools that are in state. Since Lincoln University is the first HBCU founded in 1854, the administration is continuing to keep the campus up to date. Recently, the communication program received new radio and television programming equipment. Also, Lincoln gives merit award scholarships. If you have a good GPA and SAT score coming out of high school, Lincoln could award you
